font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 专业术语： the special terms or expressions of a particular group or field
【例】 the terminology favored by sportscasters 体育节目转播员喜欢用的那些术语 || medical terminology that can be hard for the patient to understand 那些病人们难以理解的医学术语
【近】 argot, cant, dialect, jargon, jive, lingo, patois, patter, slang

【记】 term 词，术语+ logy 学
